CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1957, pg. B7 reads: "Worth The Effort - Happy bridge winners here are Ewing Helm, LaGrange, Ill., and Freida Scott, Chicago, mixed pair masters; Jeanne Heard and Lawrence Berkley, Chicago, second au revoir pair; Mary Williams, Cleveland, and John T. Wyche, Chicago, first au revoir pair."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of trophy winners, from left: Ewing Helm, Frieda Scott, Jeanne Heard, Lawrence Berkley, Mary Williams, and John T. Wyche, standing in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
